name: White Wood
description:
You went on a hike, but because of your laziness, you did not check the weather forecast for the upcoming outing! The weather in the region where you were heading is very severe. You have to survive in the harsh conditions of a snowy forest as the weather began to deteriorate.

Who knows how long the frost will last. Perhaps you will freeze in the harsh forest forever! Or survive in harsh conditions without being bent by the unbearable frost!

You need survive for a five minutes. To survive need support a fire in the bonfire, eat fresh berries and don't be a freeze!

Designer: PatraSai

Programmer: Maxim Yakovlev 

Music: Vladislav Brit

Sound: timfbro
